attributes.title: English Translator
attributes.description:
## Who we are

Remote Employees — an international outsourcing company that helps businesses from Europe, the USA and other regions find qualified remote specialists.

We are expanding our team and looking for an English-speaking specialist who can work with clients, perform translations, conduct online communication and support lead generation processes.

If you are looking for a stable remote job, enjoy communication and want to grow professionally — this position is for you.

## What you will do

Your tasks will not be limited to translation — the role includes communication, research and interaction with potential clients.

Core responsibilities:

- Communicating with potential clients in English via social networks and messengers.
- Writing and managing business correspondence.
- Maintaining and updating client databases.
- Conducting online research and gathering contact information.
- Searching for client companies on Google and other platforms.
- Supporting lead generation: identifying leads, collecting contact details, preparing information for the sales team.
- Scheduling calls and assisting the sales department.
- Working with the CRM system.
- Proactively suggesting ideas to improve processes.

## Requirements

- English proficiency B1+ or higher.
- Strong communication skills and ability to maintain business conversations.
- Ability to learn quickly and work independently.
- Discipline, attentiveness and analytical thinking.
- Basic understanding of how to search for information online.
- Interest in developing from a lead generator into a Sales or Account Manager.

## Will be an advantage

- Experience communicating with foreign clients.
- Previous work with CRM systems.
- Basic understanding of IT, marketing, web development or digital services.

## We offer

- Fully remote work — from anywhere in the world.
- Two available schedules:
  - 9:00–18:00 (1-hour break)
  - 15:00–24:00 (1-hour break)
- Saturday and Sunday — days off.
- Stable salary paid twice a month + bonus system.
- Full onboarding and support — no experience required.
- Real career growth opportunities (from Translator/Lead Generator → Sales Manager → Account Manager).
- Work with international projects, daily English practice and a supportive team.
